price: 65. Dheh (Nabiyow) anigu sideedaba waxaan ahay oo keliya dige, mana jiro ilaah (Xaq ah) aan ahayn Allaah, Waaxidka, Sandulleeyaha (daalimiinta iyo isla weynayaasha).
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ مُنذِرٞۖ وَمَا مِنۡ إِلَٰهٍ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡوَٰحِدُ ٱلۡقَهَّارُ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qul innamā anā mundhirun wamā min ilāhin illā al-lahu al-wāḥidu al-qahāru
